You are given a string $s$ consisting of lowercase English letters and an integer $n$.  Your task is to determine the number of palindromes that can be formed by inserting exactly $n$ lowercase English letters into $s$.  A palindrome is a string that reads the same forward and backward.  

The output should be the number of possible palindromes modulo 10007.
You are given a string. You need to add a specific number of letters to the string to make it read the same backward as forward.  Count how many different palindromes you can create this way.
